Package com.example.networkmeup.view.SearchJobs.ShowJobDetails

Interface ShowJobsDetailsView

All Known Implementing Classes:
ShowJobDetailsActivity, ShowJobDetailsViewStub
public interface ShowJobsDetailsView
Interface representing the contract for the Show Job Details View in the application. This interface defines methods for handling various outcomes related to job details and application submission.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    emptyCoverLetter(String message)
    Callback method to handle the scenario when the user attempts to submit an empty cover letter.
    String
    getCoverLetter()
    Method to retrieve the cover letter entered by the user for job application.
    void
    sendApplicationSuccess(String userToken)
    Callback method to handle the scenario when a job application is successfully submitted.

  • Method Details

    • sendApplicationSuccess

      void sendApplicationSuccess(String userToken)
      Callback method to handle the scenario when a job application is successfully submitted.
      Parameters:
      userToken - The authentication token of the user who submitted the application.

    • getCoverLetter

      String getCoverLetter()
      Method to retrieve the cover letter entered by the user for job application.
      Returns:
      A string representing the cover letter entered by the user.

    • emptyCoverLetter

      void emptyCoverLetter(String message)
      Callback method to handle the scenario when the user attempts to submit an empty cover letter.
      Parameters:
      message - A descriptive message explaining the issue with the empty cover letter.
